item.description:
"The Surrogates", starring Bruce Willis, opens in September. It was filmed in Worcester, so I have to schedule a meet-up for this one. To do otherwise is to dishonor our city!

September 25 is opening day. It's showing at Showcase at 7:10 PM on Friday, so how about we meet in the lobby at 6:40 PM? If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

Here's the IMDb page for the film: http://www.imdb.com/t...

- David
item.how_to_find_us: I have glasses, a goatee, and a Superman cap.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Surrogates - Meet at 6:40 at Showcase
